ing: 1 large sweet onion (such as VidaliaÂ®), finely chopped
des: "Ever since my friend Sonja made this and brought it into work, it is my signature appetizer dish to take to parties! I tweaked it a little to my taste. It is the first appetizer to go and everyone will be asking for the recipe! Serve with crackers or sliced bread. Absolutely delicious!"
ins:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Stir onion, mayonnaise, Cheddar cheese, and sugar together in a pie plate.
Bake in preheated oven until bubbly and brown around the edges, 25 to 30 minutes.
